programme.title: The First 48 - Ringside Seat
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Passenger/ Death Call
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 4 When a Tulsa man is gunned down at the wheel of his car detectives turn to a passenger who saw it all.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fast Friends /The Thin Line
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 6 In Cleveland, a young father is murdered in his car and detectives discover his friend may know who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: The First 48 - Stray Shot
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 7 When a stray shot leaves an innocent man dead in his home, Tulsa detectives discover a neighborhood under siege by young terrors.

programme.title: The First 48 - Cranked
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 8 When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Love
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 10 In Tulsa, a young woman is brutally gunned down in broad daylight. And Detective Justin Ritter suspects the witnesses know more than they are saying.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Rookie Years - Behind Bars Rookie Year
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 For rookies, the mental game in prison can be even more challenging than the physical one. D'Angelo is frustrated when he has trouble catching inmates in his unit with contraband.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Rookie Years - Behind Bars Rookie Year
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Violence against New Mexico law enforcement is on the rise, and even the smallest mistake can become devastating. Mangin joins the extraction team and must forcibly remove an unwilling inmate from his cell.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Rookie Years - Behind Bars Rookie Year
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 The department's case against the prison gangs is building and the rookies must learn to find evidence that will take them down for good. Purto redeems himself with STIU and assists in a major SNM drug bust.

programme.title: 60 Days In - Exodus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Three participants remain in Clark County Jail. One of the women in F-Pod is released, leaving Tami on the verge of a meltdown.

programme.title: 60 Days In - The Full Story-Robert, Tami, Barbra
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 91 After serving time in the dangerous world of the Clark County Jail, Barbra, Robert, and Tami are released, look back, and share never-before-seen insight into their time in jail.

programme.title: 60 Days In - The Full Story-Zac, Isaiah, Jeff and Maryum
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 90 After serving time in the dangerous world of the Clark County Jail, Zac, Isaiah, Jeff, and Maryum are released, look back, and share never-before-seen insight into their time in jail.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise - Uninhabited Island, NE Fiji Islands
programme.desc: Season 1, Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach.

programme.title: Good Morning - Pa'ako Beach, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new day dawns on Hawaii's Pa'ako beach.

programme.title: Healing Hawaii: Kauai - Healing Hawaii: Kauai
programme.desc: Season 1, A visual and audio journey around the exotic island paradise of Kauai, known as the Garden Isle. 60 different one-minute scenes of nature, slowly transitioning from one to the next.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Murdered For Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 114 When the bludgeoned body of Paul Gault was discovered lying in a pool of blood in an upstairs bedroom of his house, Northern Ireland police began to uncover the facts behind a brutal murder.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Kill or Be Killed
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Although Josh Bailey suffers from mental disabilities, he's managed to carve out a decent life for himself. But after he disappears, his parents fear he's fallen in with the wrong crowd. Chris Hansen travels to Chapel Hill, NC to uncover the true story.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Deadline: Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Jim Madonna doesn't have much to be grateful for on Thanksgiving. He recently lost his job. But when his son finds him shot to death, killed in his own car, all of Taunton, MA is shocked. Chris Hansen reveals a grim holiday tale of murder and betrayal.

programme.title: The First 48 - After the First 48: Fool for Love / Crash
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 98 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated, we can take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest, up to and including the conviction.

programme.title: The First 48 - After the First 48: Murder on the Interstate / At Close Range Update
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 99 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated, we can take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest, up to and including the conviction.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Tag Team/Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 In Memphis, TN, Lt. Caroline Mason revisits the 2007 homicide of a 19-year-old man shot to death during a street fight that got out of hand.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Stolen Lives/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 In Miami, Florida, 25-year-old Pedro Roteta is stabbed in the middle of the street and left to die. Despite video of the murder and a confession the defense attempts to get immunity based on the controversial "Stand Your Ground" law.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Devil Inside / Flight Risk
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 After a woman's dismembered body is found beneath an overpass in Tucson, Arizona, the suspect reveals a disturbing dark side.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Seduced to Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 58 A look at a seductress who kills two Georgia policemen for their life insurance benefits.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Toy Box
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 59 A state employee abducts women and keeps them captive.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Killer Cabbie
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 60 A serial killer lays siege to Jacksonville, Florida. This murderer operates with impunity, thinking he is above the law, until the sins of his past come back to haunt him and justice is served.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Random Rampage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 61 A look at a wayward son who goes on a shooting spree, killing five people from two families.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Liars and Lustful
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 32 When the body of a soap opera star is found behind a dumpster in Los Angeles, detectives unravel a sordid plot.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Grifting Grannies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 33 Investigators suspect two grannies are behind a twisted insurance scam, but they have to find the evidence that ties them to a hit-and-run.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Lessons
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 Picard is torn between love and duty when he is forced to send the woman he loves on a potentially deadly mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Chase
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 Picard finds himself in a race with Cardassians, Klingons, and Romulans to solve a four billion-year-old genetic puzzle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Frame of Mind
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 Trapped in an alien mental hospital, with little memory of the past, Riker is convinced he is going insane.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suspicions
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 A pioneering Ferengi scientist Is found dead, and Beverly risks her career to prove he was murdered.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Rightful Heir
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 Worf finds his faith sorely tested when it appears that the greatest Klingon warrior of all time has returned from the dead to reclaim the empire.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Second Chances
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 Riker's exact duplicate is discovered on Nervala IV. His first order of business: resume his relationship with Deanna. Second order: obey orders from his superior - himself.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Timescape
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Aboard a shuttlecraft and en route back to the Enterprise, Picard, LaForge, Data, and Troi find themselves trapped in a time trap of some sort, where the Enterprise is being taken over by Romulans, and the ship, itself, on a course of destruction.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent - Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 When the Borg return to do battle with the Federation, they boast a new individuality - and tempt Data when they help him feel his first emotion.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Descent (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Picard, Troi, and Geordi are held prisoner by Data, who has left the Enterprise to join his evil brother Lore as leaders of the Borg.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Liaisons
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 While the crew plays host to ambassadors from an alien race, Picard is stranded on a barren planet with a woman who falls desperately in love with him.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Interface
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 Geordi defies Picard's commands and risks his life in what appears to be a futile attempt to rescue his missing mother.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Gambit (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 4 Riker is shocked to find Picard, who has been missing and presumed dead, posing as a mercenary on an alien ship.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Gambit (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 Picard and Riker masquerade as mercenaries in order to retrieve a potentially lethal Vulcan artifact.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Thing About Machines
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Howling Man
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help. When David confronts the head monk Brother Jerome, he is told that the man is the devil, and David must decide

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A young woman lying in a hospital bed, her head wrapped in bandages, awaits the outcome of a surgical procedure performed by the State in a last-ditch attempt to make her look 'normal'.

programme.title: Tank Girl - Tank Girl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic Thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Sea Beast - Sea Beast
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The creature feature makes a bloody terrific comeback in "Sea Beast," a flesh-ripping thriller about a hideous amphibian creature that terrorizes an isolated Oregon fishing village.

programme.title: Night Drive - Night Drive
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A ride share driver's life is turned upside down after an unexpected series of misfortunes.

programme.title: How I Live Now - How I Live Now
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Set in the near-future UK, Saoirse Ronan plays Daisy, an American teenager sent to stay with relatives in the English countryside. Initially withdrawn and alienated, she begins to warm up to her charming surroundings and strikes up a romance.

programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a deadly virus wipes out most of humanity, the survivors are forced to wait in self-sustaining bunkers with a networked video interface for communication, but one by one, they start mysteriously disappearing.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Barge Of The Dead
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 B'Elanna struggles with questions of the afterlife and her Klingon heritage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tinker, Tenor, Doctor, Spy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 The Doctor's overactive imagination leads Voyager into real trouble.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Tom's latest shuttle acquisition blurs the line between man and machine.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Riddles
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 The crew discovers a new side of Tuvok when an enemy attack leaves him stripped of his Vulcan sensibilities.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dragon's Teeth
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Mysterious corridors in space lead to the discovery of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - One Small Step
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 A subspace anomaly leads to the discovery of a 21st-century space shuttle lost on a mission to Mars.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Voyager Conspiracy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 Seven uncovers a conspiracy to keep Voyager stranded in the Delta Quadrant.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Pathfinder
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 Barclay uses holograms to formulate a plan to open communications with Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Haven
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 11 Janeway's holographic love interest becomes more than just a way to pass the time.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Blink Of An Eye
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 12 Voyager becomes the unwitting focus of a planet's entire civilization.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Virtuoso
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 13 The Doctor's passion for music spills over into his personal life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Memorial
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 14 The crew is haunted by vivid images of a battle they don't remember fighting.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tsunkatse
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 Killing for sport becomes Seven's only means of survival when she is abducted into a ring of fisticuffs.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 - Girl in Gold Boots
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 2 A girl from rural California goes to Los Angeles to work as a go-go dancer, but soon gets involved with drug dealers.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja I - MST3K: Master Ninja I
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.

programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja II - MST3K: Master Ninja II
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).

programme.title: MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus - MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: MST3K: Doctor Mordrid - MST3K: Doctor Mordrid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch as the magical DOCTOR MORDRID (1992) defends Earth from the forces of evil, and Dr. Kabahl schemes to increase viewership.

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Second Honeymoon - Second Honeymoon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Revolves around a couple on the verge of announcing plans to divorce who reluctantly depart for a second honeymoon after their family surprises them with a tropical vacation as a gift for their 20th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: A Family Reunion - A Family Reunion
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In their youth, the Banner siblings made it big as a rock group, but at the height of their fame, the group fell apart. Now, fifteen years later the siblings reunite in their hometown to take care of their mother.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker - Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father and is helped through this trying time by his friendship with a dog named Tucker.

programme.title: The Christmas Shepherd - The Christmas Shepherd
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Buddy, a German Shepherd born on Christmas Day, means the world to widowed children's author Sally Brown. When a thunderstorm causes Buddy to run away from home, he ends up being adopted by a single father and his daughter.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: Beyond the Blackboard - Beyond the Blackboard
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A 24-year-old first-time teacher overcomes her initial fears and prejudices to make a difference in the lives of the homeless children she teaches in a shelter's makeshift classroom. Stars Emily VanCamp.

programme.title: The Russell Girl - The Russell Girl
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sarah Russell, the picture-perfect girl next door, took a job in Chicago thinking she could escape memories of a tragic accident that she blames herself for. But when she receives some unsettling news, Sarah returns home.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Descent
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Frozen
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Abyss
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Other Guys
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Cure
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Suspicion
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Childhood's End
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Underground
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 The team visits the Genii, a peaceful farming community, with the goal of trading for food to allow the team to continue to survive. Things take a turn, however, when they discover that the Genii are planning a massive attack against the Wraith.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Home
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Upon arriving at a new planet, M5S-224, the team discovers that they can gate back to Earth. The team sets out, with the intention of returning thanks to a new hyperdrive. But when the engines suddenly explode, the team deals with a new situation.
